name: SPACE BOIDS (donjuanjavier)
description:
Boids... in spaaaace!

FEATURES

  • Tweak flocking behavior in real-time
    • Cohesion, Separation, Alignment, and more!
  • Feed entities with energy pellets
  • Observe emergent phenomena
  • Explore the superstructure
